short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fluentify is a chrome extension that helps you to learn new languages by translating the text instantly on the web pages.

Fluentify makes translation effortless with instant popups for selected text. You can customize the popupâ€™s colors, save translations for future review, and even listen to the pronunciation of translated text. Perfect for language learners!
